title: The Harvester
description: Idyllic bliss, pristine woods, a mysterious pastGene Stratton-Porter returns us to her beloved Midwestern woodlands with a hero modeled after Henry David Thoreau. He and his “wonderful, alluring” Ruth ultimately find idyllic bliss in the pure, unspoiled woods, but not before her mysterious past is revealed and resolved.
author: Gene Stratton-Porter
